channel.title: #1045 - Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)
channel.description:
When i left click on my WAMPSERVER and go to phpMyAdmin i get this error:
Welcome to phpMyAdmin 2.11.6
phpMyAdmin tried to connect to the MySQL server, and the server rejected the connection. You should check the host, username and password in your configuration and make sure that they correspond to the information given by the administrator of the MySQL server.
Error MySQL said:
#1045 - Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)
Can someone help me?

item.title: #1045 - Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)
item.dc:creator: @SoundTable SoundTable
item.description:
@SoundTable wrote:

change your config file
conf->Conf.xml
root
root

    F2PConf.xml
<entry key="mysqluser">root</entry>
<entry key="mysqlpass">root</entry>

    P2PConf.xml
<entry key="mysqluser">root</entry>
<entry key="mysqlpass">root</entry>

if you have at “mysqlpass” allready root then remove it
simple as muffin

Read full topic
item.source: #1045 - Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)
